The comment to post.
Authcontainer of the user to post from.
Almost certainly useless and never needs to be touched. I assume that it is the member count but it can be null, non-existant, or any number under the sun.

member.summary: Handles steam user related tasks.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Community.SteamUserHandler.GetFriendList(System.UInt64,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the friends list of the specified steamid64. The profile must be set to public or the owner of the api key must be friends with them. The profile cannot be private or the method will fail and it will return null.
member.param: SteamId64 to retrieve the friends list from.
All/Friend, there are others but I do not know what.
member.returns: Null upon failure, otherwise a list of Friend objects.

member.summary: Resolves a vanity url into a SteamId64.
member.param: The vanity url part of the url (not whole url). ex: fatherfoxxy NOT https://steamcommunity.com/id/FatherFoxxy
1 - (default) Individual profile 2 - Group Profile 3 - Offical Game Group Profile
member.returns: A ResolveVanityUrlResult object.

member.summary: Handles EconService related tasks such as trade offers.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.EconServiceHandler.GetTradeOffers(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Requests all trade offers.
member.param: A dictionary containing the URL params found here: https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Steam_Web_API/IEconService at GetTradeOffers (v1). ex: [leftarrow]"get_sent_offers","1"[rightarrow]. Please note, [leftarrow] and [rightarrow] correspond to the keys on the keyboard.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.EconServiceHandler.GetTradeOffer(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Requests a single trade offer based on the tradeofferid.
member.param: The tradeofferid to request information on.
The language to use. Default: english
member.returns: A CEConTradeOffer object.

member.summary: Declines a trade offer that was sent to you.
member.param: The ID of the offer to decline.

member.summary: Cancels a trade offer based on the specified tradeofferid.
member.param: The ID of the offer to cancel.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.EconServiceHandler.AcceptTradeOffer(CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.Trade,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Accepts a specified trade offer.
member.param: A TradeId object containing the id of the trade to accept.
Auth Cookies MUST be passed here, the function will fail if not.
The AccountId of the person to trade with.
Almost always 1, not quite sure what other numbers do.
member.returns: The TradeId of the offer that was accepted.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.EconServiceHandler.AcceptTradeOffer(System.UInt64,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Accepts a specified trade offer.
member.param: A ulong representing the trade to accept.
Auth Cookies MUST be passed here, the function will fail if not.
The AccountId of the person to trade with.
Almost always 1, not quite sure what other numbers do.
member.returns: The TradeId of the offer that was accepted.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.EconServiceHandler.SendTradeOffer(System.UInt64,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.String,System.String,CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.TradeOffer)
member.summary: Sends a trade offer to the specified recipient.
member.param: The SteamId64 (ulong) of the person to send the offer to.
Auth Cookies MUST be passed here, the function will fail if not.
An optional message to be sent with the offer. Can be null.
Almost always 1, not quite sure what other numbers do.
A TradeOffer object containing the trade parameters.
member.returns: A SendOfferResponse object.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.EconServiceHandler.ModifyTradeOffer(System.UInt64,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.String,System.String,System.UInt32,CSharpTradeOffers.Trading.TradeOffer)
member.summary: Modifies an existing trade offer.
member.param: The SteamId64 (ulong) of the person whose offer will be modified.
Auth Cookies MUST be passed here, the function will fail if not.
An otpional message to be sent with the trade offer. Can be null.
Almost always 1, not quite sure what other numbers do.
The TradeId of the offer to counter or modify.
A TradeOffer object containing the trade parameters.
member.returns: A SendOfferResponse object.

member.summary: Fetch calls this method.
member.param: The URL to request.
The method to be used. Ex: POST
Dictionary> containing the paramters to be sent in the URL or in the Stream, depending on the method.
A cookiecontainer with cookies to send.
Special parameter, should only be used with requests that need "X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest" and "X-Prototype-Version: 1.7"
Sets the referrer for the request.
member.returns: An HttpWebResponse object from the requested URL.

Sets the referrer for the request.
member.returns: A string from the response stream.
